title: Eukaryotic Memory Hierarchy (Deprecated md/)
description: Historical rules for working vs. finished documents. Note: Migration to .json is ONGOING.

principles.working_docs: Stored in md/context/ or json/context/ within temporal branch. Naming: <AGENT>_<TIMESTAMP>_v<N>.
principles.finished_docs: Stored in root branch-dir (md/ or json/). Naming: User-friendly title.
principles.deprecation: Storing memories primarily as .md is DEPRECATED. Transition to structured .json for machine-readability is mandated.
